name: relettr
description: ReLettr is an API-first engine for generating (AI), validating, rendering, and sending transactional and campaign emails. The MVP consolidates today's fragmented flow: from creating MJML+Liquid templates and hard quality validation, through per-recipient render, to reliable delivery via Resend or SMTP adapters. A simple editor with guardrails and a thin newsletter demo layer sit on top for the MVP.
author: ReLettr
